TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PersianCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 代表波斯曆。

span.span: Represents the Persian calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然某些區域使用不同的月份名稱大部分的國家/地區講波斯，使用波斯曆。The Persian calendar is used in most countries where Persian is spoken, although some regions use different month names. 波斯曆已正式的行事曆伊朗和阿富汗，而其中一個替代的行事曆塔吉克哈薩克等區域中。The Persian calendar is the official calendar of Iran and Afghanistan, and it is one of the alternative calendars in regions such as Kazakhstan and Tajikistan. > [!NOTE] > 如需使用類別和其他的行事曆 .NET Framework 中的類別，請參閱[使用行事曆](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 波斯曆中的日期開始 Hijra，對應西元 622 年西元Dates in the Persian calendar start from the year of the Hijra, which corresponds to 622 C.E. 而是從一穆罕默德 (PBUH) 移轉到麥地那的那時的年份。and is the year when Muhammad (PBUH) migrated from Mecca to Medina. 例如，日期 2002 年 3 月 21 日西元For example, the date March 21, 2002 C.E. 對應至 Farvardeen 一年的月份的第一天 1381 Anno 波斯曆。corresponds to the first day of the month of Farvardeen in the year 1381 Anno Persico. 波斯曆以陽曆年為基礎，而且是大約為 365 天長。The Persian calendar is based on a solar year and is approximately 365 days long. 循環四個季節，以及新年度開始時從赤道跨越北半球檢視為從地球中心似乎太陽。A year cycles through four seasons, and a new year begins when the sun appears to cross the equator from the southern hemisphere to the northern hemisphere as viewed from the center of the Earth. 新的一年標記 Farvardeen，也就是 spring 北半球中的第一天的月份的第一天。The new year marks the first day of the month of Farvardeen, which is the first day of spring in the northern hemisphere. 每個波斯曆中的前六個月都有 31 天內、 每個未來的五個月都有 30 天，和在過去一個月有 29 天一般年份中 30 天，閏年。Each of the first six months in the Persian calendar has 31 days, each of the next five months has 30 days, and the last month has 29 days in a common year and 30 days in a leap year. 閏年是年份，除以 33，具有餘數為 1、 5、 9、 13、 17、 22、 26 或 30。A leap year is a year that, when divided by 33, has a remainder of 1, 5, 9, 13, 17, 22, 26, or 30. 比方說，1370年年份為閏年，因為除以 33 會得出餘數 17。For example, the year 1370 is a leap year because dividing it by 33 yields a remainder of 17. 每個 33 年週期有大約八個潤年。There are approximately eight leap years in every 33-year cycle. ## PersianCalendar 類別和.NET Framework 版本The PersianCalendar class and .NET Framework versions 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]、類別使用回教陽曆天文演算法，而不是 observational 的演算法來計算日期。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the class uses the Hijri solar astronomical algorithm rather than an observational algorithm to calculate dates. 這可讓與波斯曆在伊朗和阿富汗，波斯曆最普遍使用的是兩個國家/地區中使用一致的實作。This makes the implementation consistent with the Persian calendar in use in Iran and Afghanistan, the two countries in which the Persian calendar is in most widespread use. 變更會影響在.NET Framework 4 或更新版本上執行的所有應用程式[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]安裝。The change affects all apps running on the .NET Framework 4 or later if the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] is installed. 由於已變更的演算法：As a result of the changed algorithm: - 將日期 2123 西曆 1800年之間轉換的兩個演算法應該會傳回相同的結果。The two algorithms should return identical results when converting dates between 1800 and 2123 in the Gregorian calendar. - 將日期在 2123 西曆 1800年前後轉換兩種演算法可能會傳回不同的結果。The two algorithms may return different results when converting dates before 1800 and after 2123 in the Gregorian calendar. - 屬性值已從 March 21，0622 變更西曆為 March 22，0622年西曆。The property value has changed from March 21, 0622 in the Gregorian calendar to March 22, 0622 in the Gregorian calendar. - 屬性值已從波斯曆中 9378 年第 10 個月的第 10 天波斯曆中 9378 年第 10 個月 13 日。The property value has changed from the 10th day of the 10th month of the year 9378 in the Persian calendar to the 13th day of the 10th month of the year 9378 in the Persian calendar. - 方法可能會比先前傳回不同的結果。The method may return a different result than it did previously. ## 使用 PersianCalendar 類別Using the PersianCalendar class 應用程式使用物件計算波斯曆中的日期，或將波斯日期與西曆日期。Applications use a object to calculate dates in the Persian calendar or convert Persian dates to and from Gregorian dates. 您無法使用物件做為文化特性的預設曆法。You cannot use a object as the default calendar for a culture. 所指定的預設曆法屬性，而且必須是所傳回的行事曆屬性。The default calendar is specified by the property and must be one of the calendars returned by the property. 目前，類別不是支援的任何文化特性的選擇性曆法類別，因此不能是預設的行事曆。Currently, the class is not an optional calendar for any culture supported by the class and consequently cannot be a default calendar. ## Examples 下列範例會具現化物件使用屬性，建構函式和波斯曆方法。The following example instantiates objects by using the property, a constructor, and the Persian calendar's method. 然後，它會顯示這些日期在西曆和波斯行事曆中。It then displays these dates in both the Gregorian and Persian calendars. 它也會顯示波斯曆中的日期範圍。It also displays the date range of the Persian calendar. [!code-csharp[sys.glob.PersianCal#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.persianCal/cs/calendar2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.PersianCal#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.persianCal/vb/calendar2.vb#3)] 下列範例示範的欄位、 屬性和方法成員類別。The following example demonstrates the field, property, and method members of the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 特定曆法的日期計算取決於該曆法是以陽曆為主、 以陰曆為主，或以陰陽曆為主。A date calculation for a particular calendar depends on whether the calendar is solar-based, lunar-based, or lunisolar-based. ## Examples 下列範例會使用反映來具現化每個位於.NET Framework 型別，並顯示的值及其屬性。The following example uses reflection to instantiate each type found in the .NET Framework and displays the value of its property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，實作類別已從 observational 的演算法變更為回教陽曆演算法。Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the implementation of the class has changed from an observational algorithm to the Hijri solar algorithm. 如此一來，方法可能會傳回不同的值上執行時[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]比在舊版.NET Framework 上執行。As a result, the method may return different values when run on [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)] than when run on previous versions of the .NET Framework. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. [!code-csharp[sys.glob.PersianCal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.persianCal/cs/pcal.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.PersianCal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.persianCal/vb/pcal.vb#1)]

exception.span: 或 在這個日曆所支援的範圍之外。

span.span: or is outside the range supported by this calendar.

summary.span: 取得 類別所支援的最晚日期和時間。

span.span: Gets the latest date and time supported by the class.

value.span: 取得 類別所支援的最晚日期和時間。

span.span: The latest date and time supported by the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性是最後一刻的年 12 月 31 日到 9999 年The value of the property is the last moment of December 31, 9999 C.E. 西曆。in the Gregorian calendar. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，這個值相當於波斯曆中 9378 年第 10 個月 13 日。In the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], this value is equivalent to the 13th day of the 10th month of the year 9378 in the Persian calendar. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，它相當於波斯曆中 9378 年第 10 個月的第 10 天。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, it is equivalent to the 10th day of the 10th month of the year 9378 in the Persian calendar. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < PersianCalendar 類別和.NET Framework 版本 > 中主題。For more information, see "The PersianCalendar class and .NET Framework versions" in the topic. 西元 99999999 C.E. 相當於波斯曆中 9378 年。is equivalent to the year 9378 in the Persian calendar. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-csharp[sys.glob.PersianCal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.persianCal/cs/pcal.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.PersianCal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.persianCal/vb/pcal.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從開始[!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)]，值屬性就相當於 March 22，指西元 622年第一個快照Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v46](~/includes/net-v46-md.md)], the value of the property is equivalent to the first moment of March 22, 622 C.E. 西曆。in the Gregorian calendar. 在舊版中，NET Framework，它相當於 March 21，指西元 622年第一個快照In previous versions of the ,NET Framework, it is equivalent to the first moment of March 21, 622 C.E. 西曆。in the Gregorian calendar. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < PersianCalendar 類別和.NET Framework 版本 > 中主題。For more information, see "The PersianCalendar class and .NET Framework versions" in the topic. 622 C.E.622 C.E. 相當於波斯曆中 0001 年。is equivalent to the year 0001 in the Persian calendar. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法很有用，因為它可以將任何以現行曆法的日期轉換成的西曆日期。The method is useful because it can convert any date in the current calendar to a Gregorian calendar date. 西曆日期之後可用，例如，比較在不同的行事曆中的日期，或建立特定的日曆中的相等的日期。The Gregorian date can subsequently be used, for example, to compare dates in different calendars or create an equivalent date in a particular calendar. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. [!code-csharp[sys.glob.PersianCal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.persianCal/cs/pcal.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.PersianCal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.persianCal/vb/pcal.vb#1)]

exception.span: 、、、、、、 或 在這個曆法所支援的範圍之外。

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);

param.name: year
param.span: 1 到 9378 的整數，表示要轉換的年份。

span.span: An integer from 1 through 9378 that represents the year to convert.

summary.span: 將指定的年份轉換為四位數年份表示。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year representation.

returns.span: 整數，包含 的四位數表示。

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將轉換`year`參數，以使用四位數年份表示屬性。This method converts the `year` parameter to a four-digit year representation using the property. 傳回值是可讓兩位數年份，即可正確地轉譯為四位數年份的 100 年範圍的上限。The return value is the upper boundary of a 100-year range that allows a two-digit year to be properly translated to a four-digit year. 比方說，如果 100 年範圍是從透過 2029年 1930年，然後兩位數的值 30 會解譯為 1930年而兩位數為 29 值解譯為 2029年。For example, if the 100-year range is from 1930 through 2029, then a two-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930 while a two-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 支援兩位數年份或四位數年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 傳遞的兩位數年份值 (小於 100) 將使這個方法將值轉換為四位數的值根據值，表示該適當世紀。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍內的四位數年份值，方法會傳回實際的輸入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果應用程式提供支援的行事曆範圍四位數值或它提供一個負數值，方法會擲回例外狀況。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. [!code-csharp[sys.glob.PersianCal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.persianCal/cs/pcal.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.PersianCal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.persianCal/vb/pcal.vb#1)]

exception.span: 小於 0 或大於 9378。

span.span: is less than 0 or greater than 9378.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int TwoDigitYearMax { get; set; }
.property instance int32 TwoDigitYearMax
Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer
public: virtual property int TwoDigitYearMax { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 以二位數年份表示時，該 100 年範圍的最後一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性允許 2 位數的年份的 4 位數年份正確轉譯。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 例如，如果這個屬性設定為 2029年，100 年範圍是從 1930年到 2029年。For example, if this property is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 1930，而 2 位數為 29 值解譯為 2029年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 這個屬性的起始值被衍生自中控制台中的 地區及語言選項的設定。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options in Control Panel. 不過，該資訊可以變更的生命期限內。However, that information can change during the life of the . 類別不會偵測系統設定中變更自動。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically. 如果地區及語言選項不支援行事曆，這個屬性的初始值。 曆法類別所定義的預設值If the calendar is not supported in the regional and language options, the initial value of this property is the default value defined by the calendar class. 應用程式應將此值為 99，表示就其字面 2 位數的年份。The application should set this value to 99 to indicate that 2-digit years are to be taken literally. 例如，這個屬性設定為 99，100 年範圍是從 0 （不是有效值大部分的行事曆） 到 99。For example, if this property is set to 99, the 100-year range is from 0 (not a valid value for most calendars) to 99. 因此，30 的 2 位數值會解譯為 30。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 30. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. [!code-csharp[sys.glob.PersianCal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.persianCal/cs/pcal.cs#1)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.PersianCal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/sys.glob.persianCal/vb/pcal.vb#1)]

exception.span: 這個曆法是唯讀的。

span.span: This calendar is read-only.

exception.span: 設定作業中的值小於 100 或大於 9378。

span.span: The value in a set operation is less than 100 or greater than 9378.
